user.quote: She remembered who she was and the game changed. - Lalah Delia

city.name: P A R I S
city.description: I'd love to visit Paris, the stunning capital of France. I think the city is absolutely stunning and is the perfect location for a romantic getaway. I'm all here for it!

foreignLanguage.description: Based on my favourite city, I think it's no surprise that I'd love to learn French. It's such an elegant and soothing language! Below I have a few cute French phrases to get a feel of what i mean ; ).

favouriteSubjects.name: Economics
favouriteSubjects.description: The study of how to use limited resources to meet unlimited needs.

favouriteSubjects.name: Philosophy
favouriteSubjects.description: The study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality and existence.
